body: So I was on Terino and I killed someone then i noticed their armor dropped then I saw people on a different team with are armor and it turned to nighttime is this supposed to happen
body_tagged: So I was on Terino and I killed someone then i noticed their armor dropped then I saw people on a different team with are armor and it turned to nighttime is this supposed to happen
title: Terino

replies.body: if the other people get your armor then yes. The thing where it turned to night i think it is a glitch.
